description.0: Modpack compiling the mods permitted by the rules on Minebox; any additional mods are beyond my responsibility if you face sanctions.
description.1: MineboxAdditions is a mod that adds blatant features to your average Minebox gameplay !
description.2: A set of tools for a better experience on Minebox.
description.3: Discord server with an atlas and guide for Minebox (French only).
description.4: A complete visual overhaul inspired by the Minebox world â€” enhanced caves, vegetation, redstone, and integrated add-ons with full Respackopts support
description.5: Makes immature crops gray for easy field management. Includes Respackopts customization for selective crop appearance control.
description.6: Restores classic Minecraft leaf visuals, adds seasonal leaf variants, and boosts performance by reducing FPS load.
